mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEFECT_REPORT ( ID, REPORTER_NAME, CONTACT, CAR_MODEL, VIN, DEFECT_DETAILS, REPORT_DATE ) VALUES ( DEFECT_REPORT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{reporterName}, #{contact}, #{carModel}, #{vin}, #{defectDetails}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, REPORTER_NAME, CONTACT, CAR_MODEL, VIN, DEFECT_DETAILS, REPORT_DATE FROM DEFECT_REPORT ORDER BY ID DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
SELECT ID, REPORTER_NAME, CONTACT, CAR_MODEL, VIN, DEFECT_DETAILS, REPORT_DATE FROM DEFECT_REPORT WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE DEFECT_REPORT SET REPORTER_NAME = #{reporterName}, CONTACT = #{contact}, CAR_MODEL = #{carModel}, VIN = #{vin}, DEFECT_DETAILS = #{defectDetails} WHERE ID = #{id}
